select c.name, c.room, c.begin_date, c.end_date, c.master_id, e.name as masterName, c.create_time, c.update_time, (case when NOW() > c.end_date then '已结课' when NOW() < c.begin_date then '未开班' else '在读中' end) as status from clazz c left join emp e on c.master_id = e.id
and c.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and c.end_date between #{begin} and #{end}
order by c.update_time desc
